HeroSection.title: Hello There, I'm Fentahun Modawo
HeroSection.sub-title: I'm a frontend-focused full-stack web developer based in Jerusalem

TickerText.Text1: Frontend-focused Full-Stack Software Engineer open to new roles.
TickerText.Text2: Experienced in building scalable, production-grade web applications.
TickerText.Text3: Strong background in modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and frontend frameworks.
TickerText.Text4: Focused on performance, accessibility, and maintainable UI systems.
TickerText.Text5: Hands-on experience across frontend and backend boundaries.
TickerText.Text6: Comfortable working in large codebases and cross-functional teams.
TickerText.Text7: Passionate about clean architecture, testing, and code quality.
TickerText.Text8: Seeking frontend or full-stack engineering roles at scale.
TickerText.Text10: Looking for exciting challenges and to work on innovative projects.

AboutSection.title: Let’s get to know each other
AboutSection.sub-title: I craft responsive, visually polished interfaces and digital experiences - but first, here’s a bit about me.

GridItems.Title1: I am very creative when it comes to design.
GridItems.Title2: I am an active listener with a collaborative mindset, skilled in empathetic communication, analytical thinking, and conflict resolution, which enables me to understand diverse perspectives and effectively address challenges.
GridItems.Title4: Tech enthusiast with a passion for development.
GridItems.Title5: I'm probably building another Next.js / React / Angular / Vue project
GridItems.Title6: Do you want to start a project together?

workExperienceData.coming-soon-description: I'm constantly seeking for new challenges and opportunities. Your company could be my next home.

projects.projectDescription1: A modern, feature-rich personal finance management application built with Next.js 14, featuring internationalization, real-time analytics, and intelligent budget tracking. The application provides comprehensive financial management tools including transaction tracking, budget planning, saving goals, recurring transactions, and smart notifications with multi-language support and responsive design.
projects.projectDescription2: A modern, comprehensive cryptocurrency tracking and analytics platform built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and real-time market data integration. Features include real-time market data, portfolio management, smart notifications, multi-language support, and advanced analytics tools for professional crypto traders and investors.
projects.projectDescription3: Modern, full-stack chat application built with Next.js 15, React 19, Convex, and Clerk. Features real-time messaging, groups, pinned/starred messages, reactions, media uploads, group management with roles, and robust authentication with webhook sync. Built with shadcn/ui, Radix UI, and Tailwind CSS 4.
projects.projectDescription4: A modern, feature-rich code snippet management application built with Next.js 14, featuring intelligent search, syntax highlighting, version history, sequences, and powerful organization tools. Includes Clerk authentication, MongoDB database, and support for over 100 programming languages with beautiful UI/UX.
projects.projectDescription5: A REAL Software-as-a-Service app with AI features and a payments and credits system using the latest tech stack.
projects.projectDescription6: Recreated the Apple iPhone 15 Pro website, combining GSAP animations and Three.js 3D effects.

TestimonialSection.title: My colleague's Testimonial
TestimonialSection.subTitle: Don't just take my word for it, hear what they got to say

testimonials.jobTitle1: Teacher, entrepreneur and independent business owner
testimonials.testimonial1: After teaching Fentahun, I had the pleasure of witnessing firsthand his exceptional dedication, strong work ethic, and genuine passion for learning. His commitment to personal growth and continuous pursuit of excellence was evident in every project he took part in, consistently demonstrating determination, precision, and a keen attention to detail. I am confident that Fentahun will excel in any professional environment he chooses to join, as his outstanding qualities position him for a bright future as a professional Full Stack Developer. Wishing you continued success!
